entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
